properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:47AM CST until January 13 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Oklahoma...

Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties.

Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair...Cherokee and Delaware
Counties.

Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Illinois River near Tahlequah.
* until Monday afternoon, or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:30 AM Saturday, the stage was 10.59 feet.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The Illinois River near Tahlequah is expected to rise
above flood stage late this morning and continue to rise to near
17.0 feet by Sunday morning. The river is expected to fall below
flood stage Monday morning.
* Impact...At 17.0 feet, severe flooding occurs from Hanging Rock
downstream towards Tahlequah. Access roads east of Combs Bridge
near Eagles Bluff are impassable. Some cabins and parks may be
flooded to a depth of a couple of feet. Extreme turbulence makes
the river too hazardous for floating.
